data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 92,000 souls in Nabatiyeh and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nabatiyeh, Lebanon
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Nabatiyeh, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 140 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Nabatiyeh who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 92,000 souls living in the state of Nabatiyeh with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Alawite people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Alawite people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Alawite people is yours.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Nabatiyeh hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 654 believers in Nabatiyeh, Lebanon a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nabatiyeh, Lebanon has a population of 92,000.

We estimate Nabatiyeh has 654 people who might know Jesus, 29,577 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 61,769 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 140 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Nabatiyeh, Lebanon who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
